1.content:
Welcome to the UG! That's underground for those that don't know what that means. In this world, you take on the role of either a Reaper or Player in a game where everything is at stake.

If you have what it takes to carry out your task then feel free. Just remember eight rules:

1. Reapers can't directly take out Players unless the Composer says otherwise.

2. Reapers aren't allowed to force Players to take out their partners under any circumstance.

3. When a mission is given out, it doesn't matter who completes the mission as long as a Player completes the mission within the time limit.

4. When entering the Reaper's game, You must offer up a entry fee to participate.

5. If the Players reach Day 7 and beat the Game Master, they are evaluated by the Composer to see who is worthy of living again.

6. If a Player wants to, they can request to become a reaper but only if the Composer accepts their request.

7. If one of the Players is erased, the Player's partner will have seven minutes to pair up with a player that's by him or herself or risk fading away as well.

8.A player can imprint an idea into a person's head but it can only be one word at a time.

Just remember one important thing, you can't win this game alone. You have to fight alongside a partner. You can gain a partner by making a pact. I'll explain more once you get in.

For now, Choose who you are...

(For more information about this game, go to wikipedia and type in "the world ends with you" or just play the game if you want a more detail description.)
1.title: The start of a deadly game

11.content:
The Players are pretty much people who have died in the real ground (Or RG for short) and are being given the chance to live again by playing a dangerous game.

They all have their reasons for wanting to win but if it comes down to it, they will fight other players to reach the end.

There are even Players who don't care about making friends but considering the nature of the Reaper's game, that's not a huge surprise.

So provide your name and your entry fee and let the games begin!
11.title: The important characters of the story

111.content:
Appearance: Leon is an aquamarine cat standing at about 5'2''. His tail is a light shade of blue and he wears a red jacket and red shoes. He also wears neon green gloves.

His eyes are amber and he has a small scar on his left cheek. He also wears a blue bandanna on his fore head.

Personality: He's has a tough guy appearance but he's quite shy. He tries not to talk much and lets his fists do the talking.

But just because he prefers his fists to his words, doesn't mean he's violent. He'll try to avoid battles if he can help it. He is also caring and has a strong sense of justice.

But sometimes, he's easily too curious for his own good and will often be more subtle of his intentions. But he often helps those who can't help themselves in any situation.

How he died: He protected a little fox from being attacked by a gang. He defeated the gangsters easily but one of them set off an explosion with a gun while they were in a warehouse.

Entry Fee: His fighting skills

Pins on hand: Two pins. The other

1. Has a picture of a sword on it. Pulls out a sword and slashes the enemy nearest to him with it.

2. Has a picture of a boomerang. Self explanatory.
111.title: Leon the Cat

choices: Find another person to be your partner
1111.content:
Leon was falling in a black abyss with no idea what was going on around him. He tries to open his eyes but he can't for some reason. He tries to recall the last memory he had.

He remembers protecting a little fox from a gang and he leveled those guys in no time but one of jerks pulled out a gun and shot an air tank.

There was a big explosion and then silence. He then hears a voice in his head that asks "Do you want another chance a life? Come play my game and I might give you another chance."

Leon thought about it and decided to accept it because he still had things to do. The voice then says "Okay. I'll drop the rules of the game into your head."

Leon nodded and then he felt a painful headache. The voice then said "Remember those rules because I won't repeat them again. Now let's talk about your entry fee."

Leon then said "I'll give up my martial arts to play." The voice thought about it and then said "I can't find anything else you value more so I'll accept those skills."

Leon then felt a bright light envelop him.

Station Square

DAY 1

Leon woke up to the sound of a busy intersection. He looked around at the many cars that seem to look for destinations that they'll never reach.

Leon then noticed that every person he walked by paid no attention to him. He dug around his pants and found a mysterious black pin.

Leon gives it a second look and then suddenly, he starts hearing voices but they sounded more like thoughts than actual voices addressing him.

He then sees a light brown terrier walking around trying to figure out where she is. He could tell it's a she from the way she walks and stands.

Leon then puts the mysterious pin in his pocket as he approaches the terrier.

Suddenly, Leon gets an email on his cell phone than tells him 'Get to Tony's hardware store. Complete in 30 min. or face erasure.'

Leon didn't want to know what erasure meant so he went over the rules in his head. He then decided he needed a partner but he wasn't sure about the terrier...
1111.title: The First Day of the Reaper's Game

12.content:
Reapers are pretty much one of the main opponents of the Players. They usually take on Players directly but when the rules forbid them to attack.

They fight with strange creatures known as Noise. They are the grunts of the Reapers and very persistent.

Reapers are in charge of attacking the Players and opening walls when the Players meet certain objectives.

Some Reapers might be more eager for battle than others so they try to make things interesting like trying to kill Players in specific ways.

But for some reason, there's rumors going around of forbidden Noise appearing and taking out Reapers. Better be careful if that rumor turns out true. So what's your name Reaper?
12.title: Angel of death

13.content:
Game Masters are very similar to Reapers but they play a different roll. Game Masters are in charge of what the mission for each day is.

The Mission can be anything as long as it doesn't break the rules. Game Masters have more power than the Reapers and they must be challenged on day 7.

As mentioned in the rules, if the Players beat the Game Master, they win the game and they're evaluated by the Composer.

The Game Master's job is to defeat the Players either through them failing to complete a mission in time or defeating them on Day 7.

You basically make life hard for the Players and crush any remaining fools on Day 7. There is only one Game Master per game just to let you know.

So what's your name Game Master?
13.title: Meet the Game Master!

131.content: Looks to be you finally come to myself the Game Master. Excuse the formal, you just call me Mr. Mallus. So I been watching you very long time indeed; Believing me I see hows you suffer. To feel how you fall tearing me up. What great fortunes you hold to here. It isn't everyday I chanced to come across someone in need as yourself. Trust me this time I answered your please. Release the heavy humanity for meself to burden. This with all I ask when your life becomes be free.
131.title: Meeting Mr. Mallus

14.content:
You're probably wondering what this one is? A Guardian pretty much enforces the rules of the Reaper's Game.

If a Reaper breaks the rules, the Guardian reports them to the Composer where they are judged. You can call the Guardians the law enforcement the Reaper's game.

So what's your name Guardian?
14.title: Don't be fooled by the title

15.content: Even more choices! Pick your path and show them who's boss!
15.title: Extra slots

151.content: Another section for selecting a player.
151.title: Even more Players!

info.brief_description: When you die, sometimes you're worthy of a second chance but what would you throw away?
info.description:
Due to events out of your control, you die in an unexpected way. In your final moments, you hear a voice that tells you that you're being given a second

chance to live if you win what the voice has in mind. You enter into a game called the Reaper's Game where crazy things happen. You must join a side

and figure out what you want from this game. Your fate is in your hands! You can choose your race if you want just as long as there's a back story to

that character. Remember to be creative and involve as many characters as you want.
info.pretty_title: The road that lies beyond death
